Sentencas: Thin films of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) deposited by sputtering and plasma spraying have been analysed as solid electrolyte for oxygen gas sensors and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Yttria-stabilized zirconia films deposited by plasma spraying and sputtering

Sentencas: Different substrates have been considered in order to provide good adhesion, dense electrolyte films, and mechanical and thermal stability.
Titulo: Yttria-stabilized zirconia films deposited by plasma spraying and sputtering

Sentencas: By optimization of the sputtering parameters, a Pt/YSZ/Pt assembly of 1.5 mum thickness and with an electrical resistance of 500 MOmega at room temperature has been obtained.
Titulo: Yttria-stabilized zirconia films deposited by plasma spraying and sputtering

Sentencas: The plasma-sprayed films (150 mum thickness) have shown oxygen ion conductivity with a reproducible sensitivity on oxygen partial pressure starting at 400degreesC and an activation energy of similar to1 eV. Lanthanum strontium manganate (350 mum thickness) was sprayed as cathode material.
Titulo: Yttria-stabilized zirconia films deposited by plasma spraying and sputtering
